title.rendered: NEWTECONS CONDUCTS THE SIGNING CEREMONY FOR BUSINESS-PRODUCTION PLAN IN 2021

content.rendered:
(HCMC – 30/01/2021) Newtecons Construction Investment Joint Stock Company conducted the Signing Ceremony for Business-Production Plan in 2021. The event was attended by the Board of Directors, Managers of Departments and Construction Site Senior personnel.

Speaking at the commencement of the signing ceremony, Mr. Tran Kim Long, General Director shared that on January 16th, during the 2021 Strategy and Implementation Plan Protection Ceremony, the Board of Directors and Managers together discuss and present about the upcoming business plan. Each has a target and receives many comments and criticism to have the most optimal solution for the implementation. “After completing and agreeing on the solutions, today we sign this plan. I believe that, with our determined and unanimous efforts, Newtecons will achieve the goals of 2021 ”, Mr. Long emphasized.


Through the signing, the key managers of Newtecons, representing all employees, committed to the Board of Directors to implement the goals and action plan for 2021.

2020 has been a difficult year for all company’s affected by the Covid-19, and Newteccons is no exception. However, with the strong internal strength, Newtecons has continued to leave a strong and positive impressions on the market. The result of this is that many projects have been commenced across Vietnam, giving Newtecons positive business results. This has been considered as a great effort between the Board of Directors and employees to overcome challenges and bring success of Newtecons in 2020.

In 2021, the Newtecons Board of Directors oriented the business strategies for each stage of continuing development, securing the “Forward to the Future” vision, and cementing Newtecons a leading main contractors in Vietnam.
